author: cerminar
body:
#### PR description:

Several changes

* More realistic handling of calo emulation to support for FW test-benches by @cerminar in https://github.com/p2l1pfp/cmssw/pull/138
   * Introduce common HAD+EM calo format for barrel decoded objects (same link @ TMUX18) and use it in barrel regionizer
   * remove pt cuts on clusters applied outside emulator code
   * more flexible configuration and debugging options for HGC ID model
   * Add some TM18 dump files needed for HLS test-benches

* Fix handling of phi wrap around in seeded cone  https://github.com/p2l1pfp/cmssw/pull/133

* Synchronise packing order of z0/mass with unpacking order. by @EmyrClement in https://github.com/p2l1pfp/cmssw/pull/142
* Fix writing of wide cone jets to pattern files by @EmyrClement in https://github.com/p2l1pfp/cmssw/pull/141

* NGT Jet Tagger bit accurate emulation by @Chriisbrown in https://github.com/p2l1pfp/cmssw/pull/140

* Implement correct 64-bit packing of PFCandidates for scouting purposes (15_1_X) by @gpetruc in https://github.com/p2l1pfp/cmssw/pull/147
* Make corrector for pt calibration able to run without ROOT for HLS test-bench by @cerminar in https://github.com/p2l1pfp/cmssw/pull/144

#### PR validation:

ongoing.



Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:
- verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch
- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html)
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)

title: Phase-2 L1T: Update correlator emulator chain
